name: Maze (itch) (Kuira Kariuki)
description:
The player is lost in a maze and his/her objective is to get to the end of the maze without dying.

On the way, the player will come across different gems that affect game-play as follows:

• Blue gems add ten points to the players score.
• Orange gems add twenty points to the players score.
• Purple gems, which show that the player is close to the end of the maze, add thirty points to the players score.
